text: Antonio Maurer (born 25 February 1963) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Antonio Maurer
